tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT FUNNEL((useraction.targetUrl like "%${campaign.value}%") AS "Spring Sale", (useraction.name="${finish}") AS "Purchase") FROM usersession where useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT FUNNEL((useraction.targetUrl like "%${campaign2.value}%") AS "Special Offers", (useraction.name="${finish}") AS "Purchase") FROM usersession where useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT continent as "Continent", SUM(${revenue.id}) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} = "${campaign.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}" GROUP BY continent ORDER BY sum(${revenue.id}) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT continent as "Continent", SUM(${revenue.id}) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} = "${campaign2.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}" GROUP BY continent ORDER BY sum(${revenue.id}) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT SUM(errorCount) as "Total" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%${campaign.value}%") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT SUM(errorCount) as "Total" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%${campaign2.value}%") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(useraction.visuallyCompleteTime) as "Average" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%${campaign.value}%") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(${revenue.id}) as "$$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} = "${campaign.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT Count(*) as "Total" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%${campaign.value}%") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT Count(*) as "Total" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%${campaign2.value}%") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(useraction.visuallyCompleteTime) as "Average" FROM useraction where (targetUrl like "%${campaign2.value}%") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT ${source.id} as "Source", ${medium.id} as "Medium",  SUM(${revenue.id}) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} = "${campaign.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}" GROUP BY ${source.id}, ${medium.id} ORDER BY sum(${revenue.id}) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT ${source.id} as "Source", ${medium.id} as "Medium",  SUM(${revenue.id}) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} = "${campaign2.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}" GROUP BY ${source.id}, ${medium.id} ORDER BY sum(${revenue.id}) DESC

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT SUM(${revenue.id}) as "$$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} = "${campaign.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT SUM(${revenue.id}) as "$$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} ="${campaign2.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(${revenue.id}) as "$$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key}="${campaign2.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.customName: Booking Total by Continent, Country, Region & City
tiles.query: SELECT Continent, Country, Region, City, SUM(${revenue.id}) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} = "${campaign.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}" and city IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Continent, Country, Region, City ORDER BY sum(${revenue.id}) DESC Limit 10

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.customName: Booking Total by Continent, Country, Region & City
tiles.query: SELECT Continent, Country, Region, City, SUM(${revenue.id}) as "Total Booking $$$" FROM usersession where (${campaign.key} = "${campaign2.value}") and (useraction.name="${finish}") and useraction.application="${app.name}" and city IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Continent, Country, Region, City ORDER BY sum(${revenue.id}) DESC Limit 10
